title: Nice hotel
text: Stayed here for three nights. Hotel is halfway between boutique and business hotel. It is in North River, a 5-minute walk from N. Michigan Ave. Rooms were nicely decorated and clean. I did not find the free buffet breakfast that great as the choice was rather limited (no healthy options, only muffins and other pastries). The happy hour is a great idea but the room it is held in is very small and crowded.
